1. '''VNC client'''
  a. Confirm client offers VNC protocol as an option
  a. Confirm client can connect to VNC service on Linux remote machine
  a. Confirm client can connect to VNC service on Windows remote machine
  a. Confirm client can control desktop of remote machine
  a. Confirm ability to send commands (ex.Ctrl+Alt+Del)

1. '''RDP client'''
  a. Confirm client offers RDP protocol as an option
  a. Confirm client can connect to RDP service on Linux remote machine
  a. Confirm client can connect to RDP service on Windows remote machine
  a. Confirm client can control desktop of remote machine
  a. Confirm ability to send commands (ex.Ctrl+Alt+Del)

1. '''Support for screen scaling and panning'''
  a. Confirm that when resolutions mismatch using VNC remote screen can be panned
  a. Confirm that when resolutions match using VNC remote screen is scaled properly
  a. Confirm that when resolutions mismatch using RDP remote screen can be panned
  a. Confirm that when resolutions match using RDP remote screen is scaled properly

1. '''Stylus to Mouse click conversion'''
  a. Confirm that all actions that can be accomplished with a mouse can also be performed with stylus in VNC
  a. Confirm that all actions that can be accomplished with a mouse can also be performed with stylus in RDP
